forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 53F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. WSW winds at 40 to 55 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 47F. WSW winds at 25 to 35 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low around 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 48F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Windy with showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 51F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 40F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
